DOC.brief_summary: Hypothesis: Intraarticular injections of isotonic Xylitol solution will improve pain in patients with knee osteoarthritis (OA).
DOC.brief_title: Intraarticular Xylitol Injections for Knee Osteoarthritis
DOC.criteria: Age over 45 Tibiofemoral osteoarthritis OA stage 23 on xray Pain VAS > 40mm No NSAIDs for 3 weeks No analgetics for 38 hours Pain VAS > 80mm Pain VAS in contralateral knee > 40mm Inflammatory arthritis Severe effusion Posttraumatic osteoarthritis Unstable knee Isolated patellofemoral disease Paracetamol hypersensitivity
